content.question: The figure above shows the graph of <math alttext="y equals, 2 times sine x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and the line <math alttext="y equals 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="0 less than or equal to x, less than or equal to pi" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mi>π</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the sum of the areas of the shaded regions?

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to pi, of, open parenthesis, 2 times sine x, minus 1, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to the fraction pi over 6, of, 2 times sine x, d x, plus, the integral from, the fraction pi over 6 to the fraction 5 pi over 6, of, 1, d x, plus, the integral from, the fraction 5 pi over 6, to pi, of, 2 times sine x, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to the fraction pi over 6, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus 2 times sine x, close parenthesis, d x, plus, the integral from, the fraction pi over 6 to the fraction 5 pi over 6, of, open parenthesis, 2, sine x, minus 1, close parenthesis, times, d, x plus, the integral from, the fraction 5 pi over 6, to pi, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus 2 times sine x, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, 0 to pi, of, open parenthesis, 2 times sine x, plus 1, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the integral from, 0 to the fraction pi over 6, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus 2 times sine x, close parenthesis, d x, plus, the integral from, the fraction pi over 6 to the fraction 5 pi over 6, of, open parenthesis, 2, sine x, minus 1, close parenthesis, times, d, x plus, the integral from, the fraction 5 pi over 6, to pi, of, open parenthesis, 1 minus 2 times sine x, close parenthesis, d x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mrow><mi>π</mi></mrow></msubsup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.6: Finding the Area Between Curves That Intersect at More Than Two Points

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Identify mathematical information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and/or verbal representations.
